subject: re:On-line generic store
body:
Dear valued member.
Summer season is a great time to improve your health. For this reason MyCanadianPharmacy announced huge discounts as a special care for loyal customers. 
MyCanadianPharmacy sells low price products without compromising quality. No online store has such a prompt service, fast delivery, and high level of confidentiality. Incredible selection of products. With us you will never receive faked and counterfeit drugs. 
Save your money with one mouse click. http://www.luryeles.com
Yours faithfully,Russ Mccarthy
